word.English: sticky rice cake w/ red bean paste
word.description: {豆} is *bean*, and {沙} is *sand*, so {豆沙} is *bean sand* (bean paste). {餅} is *cookie* or (usually round) *cake*, so 豆沙餅 is *red bean cake*.

images.place: Ping Pang Pong, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: Glutinous rice filled with red bean paste (made from [adzuki beans](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adzuki_bean))), pan-fried.

word.English: sticky rice cake w/ black sesame paste
word.description: {黑} is *black*, and {芝麻} is *sesame seed*, and together {黑芝麻} is *black sesame seed paste*. {餅} is *cookie* or (usually round) *cake*, so 黑芝麻餅 is *black sesame seed paste cake*.

images.place: Hong Kong Garden, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: Glutinous rice with a black sesame paste filling, pan-fried.

word.English: sticky rice cake w/ green tea paste

images.place: Ping Pang Pong, Las Vegas, Nevada

description: Glutinous rice with a green tea paste filling.
